nodes.bodyText: should this be LOG.error? Also, is there something in TaskInfo info that would be useful to print to the log?
There is a LOG.info of when the job starts that contains more details. Job failing is actually fairly frequent enough that info log is okay.
Maybe this should be warn? Also, is there something in TaskInfo info that would be useful to print to the log?
I also think info here is fine. Also we have a Job Start info log that lets you know about some of the details for cross referencing.
